00032 #include "string.h"
00033 #include <time.h>
00034 
00035 #include "libless.h"
00036 #include "libless_err.h"
00037 #include "libless_timing.h"
00038 #include "openssl/engine.h"
00039 
00040 /*============================================================================*/
00041 /* Public definitions                                                         */
00042 /*============================================================================*/
00043 
00044 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00045         libless_t env;
00046         libless_params_t parameters;
00047         libless_master_t master_key;
00048         libless_partial_t partial_key;
00049         libless_secret_t secret;
00050         libless_public_t public_key;
00051         libless_private_t private_key;
00052         libless_signature_t signature;
00053         unsigned char id[] = { 'u', 's', 'e', 'r' };
00054         unsigned char data[] = { 'm', 'e', 's', 's', 'a', 'g', 'e', '\0' };
00055         int verified;
00056         int code;
00057 
00058         INIT_TIMING();
00059 
00060         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00061 
00062         libless_init(&env);
00063         libless_parameters_init(&parameters);
00064         libless_master_init(&master_key);
00065         libless_partial_init(&partial_key);
00066         libless_secret_init(&secret);
00067         libless_public_init(&public_key);
00068         libless_private_init(&private_key);
00069         libless_signature_init(&signature);
00070 
00071         TIMING_BEFORE();
00072 
00073         TRY(libless_setup(&env, &parameters, &master_key), goto end);
00074 
00075         TIMING_AFTER();
00076         COMPUTE_TIMING(libless_setup);
00077 
00078         printf("System parameters and master key generated.\n");
00079 
00080         TIMING_BEFORE();
00081 
00082         TRY(libless_extract(&env, &partial_key, id, 4, master_key, parameters),
00083                         goto end);
00084 
00085         TIMING_AFTER();
00086         COMPUTE_TIMING(libless_extract);
00087 
00088         printf("Partial private key extracted.\n");
00089 
00090         TIMING_BEFORE();
00091 
00092         TRY(libless_set_secret(&env, &secret, parameters), goto end);
00093 
00094         TIMING_AFTER();
00095         COMPUTE_TIMING(libless_set_secret);
00096 
00097         printf("Secret value set.\n");
00098 
00099         TIMING_BEFORE();
00100 
00101         TRY(libless_set_public(&env, &public_key, secret, parameters), goto end);
00102 
00103         TIMING_AFTER();
00104         COMPUTE_TIMING(libless_set_public);
00105 
00106         printf("Public key set.\n");
00107 
00108         TIMING_BEFORE();
00109 
00110         TRY(libless_set_private(&env, &private_key, secret, partial_key,
00111                                         parameters), goto end);
00112 
00113         TIMING_AFTER();
00114         COMPUTE_TIMING(libless_set_private);
00115 
00116         printf("Private key set.\n");
00117 
00118         TIMING_BEFORE();
00119         
00120         TRY(libless_sign(&env, &signature, data, sizeof(data), id, 4, public_key,
00121                                         private_key, parameters), goto end);
00122 
00123         TIMING_AFTER();
00124         COMPUTE_TIMING(libless_sign);
00125         
00126         TIMING_BEFORE();
00127 
00128 signature.image[0]=0;
00129 
00130         verified = 0;
00131         TRY(libless_verify(&env, &verified, signature, data, sizeof(data), id, 4, 
00132                                         public_key, parameters), goto end);
00133 
00134         TIMING_AFTER();
00135         COMPUTE_TIMING(libless_verify);
00136 
00137         if (!verified) {
00138                 goto end;
00139         }
00140         
00141         printf("Signature verified.\n");
00142         
00143         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00144 end:
00145         if (code == LIBLESS_ERROR) {
00146                 printf("Test failed.\n");
00147         } else {
00148                 printf("Test succeded.\n");
00149         }
00150         libless_signature_clean(&signature);
00151         libless_private_clean(&private_key);
00152         libless_partial_clean(&partial_key);
00153         libless_secret_clean(&secret);
00154         libless_public_clean(&public_key);
00155         libless_master_clean(&master_key);
00156         libless_parameters_clean(&parameters);
00157         libless_clean(&env);
00158 }
